external_games.name: Christmas Carol vs. The Ghost of Christmas Presents

name: Christmas Carol vs. The Ghost of Christmas Presents
storyline:
'Twas the night before Christmas...

You are on a mission.
The children of the world are counting on you...

Can you save Christmas?

As Carol Greenleaf, one of Santa's most trusted elves, you must explore the dark and frozen Ice-Cube Caverns to retrieve all the presents before the Evil Snowman returns.
summary: Christmas Carol vs. The Ghost of Christmas Presents is an action arcade game. Guide Carol through the maze-like caverns to pick up all the Christmas presents while avoiding her enemies. Along the way, pick up candy and magical snowflakes that award you additional points and help you on your adventure.
